survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Corporate Mindfulness Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with corporate mindfulness programs to improve workplace well-being initiatives.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you participate in the corporate mindfulness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to measure participation frequency. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.
